translation.Name: Belgium Note - Ridders Van Licht HQ #1
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_0: We arenâ€™t accepting anymore people from Belgium to evacuate unless they are Nulirane Researchers or other specified personnel that are permitted for evacuation.
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_2: Civilians, law enforcement, military personnel etc are on their own in Belgium until a plan of action is put into place. The Belgian Government and other nations are trying their best to determine a course of action.
